tags.name: whatsapp-button
tags.description: A simple button to start a whatsapp conversation.

properties.name: label
properties.description: This is the label given to the button

properties.name: text
properties.description: The message sent to the number

properties.name: dialcode
properties.description: This international dialing code for the number. (E.g 44 for a UK number)

properties.name: number
properties.description: The number to which to start the conversation with and send the text

properties.name: responsive
properties.description: If true, the component will automatically stick to the bottom of the screen on mobile devices for a clean responsive look.

properties.name: bypass
properties.description: If true, the component will show a dialog and try to open whatsapp itself instead of redirecting via WhatsApps ugly page.
